sample_docs: Face-based Biometrics Certified 3D Liveness Detection Selfie-based Authentication Trust the Global Leader in AI-Powered Identity Verification Jumio's AI-powered Trusted Identity as a Service connects to your product, app or service to verify your customers' real-world identities. With a simple ID scan and real-time selfie, Jumio lets you accurately and seamlessly know, verify and trust your customer. Optimize conversions Onboard good customers faster with a user-friendly, seamless customer experience. Deter and detect fraud Prevent online fraud and account takeover to create a safe, trusted online ecosystem. Meet compliance mandates Comply with regulations and directives including AML, KYC, GDPR and PSD2. Simplify authentication Replace outdated KBA and 2FA methods with a process as simple as taking a selfie. Trusted Identity & Authentication Solutions From onboarding verification to ongoing authentication, Jumio offers a complete solution to know, verify and trust your customers. Jumio ID Verification Determine if an ID is authentic and belongs to the user. Error-proof image capture Simple user experience Catch fake IDs get details Jumio Identity Verification Ensure that the person behind a transaction is who they say they are. Government-issued ID + selfie Liveness detection Compare ID photo to selfie get details Jumio Document Verification Easily scan documents even if folded, creased or crumpled. Meet KYC & AML directives Establish proof of residence Scan utility bills, bank statements and more get details Jumio Authentication Replace outdated KBA and 2FA with the simplicity and security of a selfie. Verify enrolled users Unlock access to passwords, accounts and other enrolled services Fast, secure and reliable get details New! Jumio Screening ID verification + complete AML screening and monitoring. Customizable risk screening Automated onboarding and ongoing monitoring Instant results and reduced false positives get details Ai the Jumio Way Learn how we deliver the highest verification accuracy in near-real-time using augmented intelligence and machine learning. Over 200 million identities verified, and counting.
